title: PEAC Audit Allowlist
description: Time-bounded exceptions for pnpm audit advisories. Each entry must have an expiry date to prevent permanent ignores.

advisory_id.description: The advisory ID from pnpm audit (e.g., GHSA-xxxx-yyyy-zzzz)

reason.description: Why this advisory is temporarily acceptable

expires_at.description: ISO 8601 date after which the exception expires (YYYY-MM-DD)

remediation.description: Planned fix (version bump, patch, or replacement)

issue_url.description: Link to tracking issue for remediation
